trans-unit.source: Re-enter your new password to confirm.
trans-unit.target: Re-enter your new password to confirm.

trans-unit.source: Enter a question to be used when retrieving your password.
trans-unit.target: Enter a question to be used when retrieving your password.

trans-unit.source: Enter an answer to the password question.
trans-unit.target: Enter an answer to the password question.

trans-unit.source: The date this password was last changed.
trans-unit.target: The date this password was last changed.

trans-unit.source: The date this password will expire.
trans-unit.target: The date this password will expire.

trans-unit.source: Enter the password question you want to use. Choose a question that only you will know the answer to.
trans-unit.target: Enter the password question you want to use. Choose a question that only you will know the answer to.

trans-unit.source: Enter the answer to your password question.
trans-unit.target: Enter the answer to your password question.

trans-unit.source: In order to change your password, you will need to provide your current password, as well as your new password and a confirmation of your new password.
trans-unit.target: In order to change your password, you will need to provide your current password, as well as your new password and a confirmation of your new password.

trans-unit.source: To change a password for this user enter the new password and then re-enter to confirm.
trans-unit.target: To change a password for this user enter the new password and then re-enter to confirm.

trans-unit.source: Press the Reset Password button to send a password reset mail to the user. The reset link will be valid for 24hrs.
trans-unit.target: Press the Reset Password button to send a password reset mail to the user. The reset link will be valid for 24hrs.

trans-unit.source: You can reset your password to a new randomly generated password by providing the answer to the following password question.
trans-unit.target: You can reset your password to a new randomly generated password by providing the answer to the following password question.

trans-unit.source: You can update your password question and answer by entering your current password and the question and answer you want to use.
trans-unit.target: You can update your password question and answer by entering your current password and the question and answer you want to use.

trans-unit.source: The Site Administrator has required you to change your password, before you can log in. To do this they have marked your account as requiring a new password, which sends out a password reset token email. Please check your email and use the link to reset your password. If you cannot find the email, please press Reset Password to request another one.
trans-unit.target: The Site Administrator has required you to change your password, before you can log in. To do this they have marked your account as requiring a new password, which sends out a password reset token email. Please check your email and use the link to reset your password. If you cannot find the email, please press Reset Password to request another one.

trans-unit.source: Your configuration requires the user to enter a Question and Answer for the Password reminder. When this setting is applied Administrators are unable to change a user's password, so the feature has been disabled for this site.
trans-unit.target: Your configuration requires the user to enter a Question and Answer for the Password reminder. When this setting is applied Administrators are unable to change a user's password, so the feature has been disabled for this site.

trans-unit.source: Provide the reset token from the email.
trans-unit.target: Provide the reset token from the email.

trans-unit.source: Reset Password option is currently unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Reset Password option is currently unavailable.

trans-unit.source: If the user name entered was correct, you should receive a new email shortly with a link to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: If the user name entered was correct, you should receive a new email shortly with a link to reset your password.
